problem: The five highest kick return averages, in yards, in the NFL's history were 25.0, 24.3, 24.1, 23.8 and 23.4. What is the median of these five averages? Express your answer as a decimal to the nearest tenth.
solution: If we arrange these five return averages in ascending order, the median will be the middle number: $$23.4,23.8,\textbf{24.1},24.3,25.0$$ The median of these five averages is $\boxed{24.1}$.
